cause.description:
Inside Dharma is a non-profit, non-denominational Buddhist organization dedicated to offering information, support and encouragement to incarcerated and recently released individuals in a manner consistent with Buddhist principles.
Inside Dharma:
* supplies VIC's to Missouri prisons, * connects penpals with interested inmates, * sends reading and practice materials and the Inside Dharma Newsletter to inmates, * provides recently released inmates with limited material assistance and * provides recently released inmates references to useful agencies and opportunities.
1. Prison inmates need help to change.
2. Non-violence and self-improvement are vital to prison reform.
cause.name: Inside Dharma
